title: An unknown error has accured
body:
* everytime I hit the play button it says "An unknown error has accured" and it doesn't let me play can anybody help me with a fix I just downloaded the PBE client and I haven't played one game yet please help me. Thank you!
* Here is a screenshot of what it says to me: http://prntscr.com/d4g4eb

replies.body:
Since you're using the *Alpha Client*, there are bound to be issues, which means we can offer limited troubleshooting. I'd recommend ensuring your [network settings are compatible with League](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as problematic network settings can cause this issue.

Let me know if these steps caused any change for you.
